It's a very realistic journey Ellie goes on\, and anytime you deal with this subject matter\, sad and frustrating encounters will happen\, such as people you care about deeply dying. This is the violent feral world that has been established in the first game\, and many people who are upset by these very realistic consequences\, aka  characters getting hurt or killed\, are forgetting the world this game is set in. If you trust Neil Druckman and go along with the story that's being told\, crying when s*** gets sad\, raging when Ellie is rightly furious\, falling in love when things get romantic and playful\, it will only be a more powerful gaming experience.
